ygData.subject: RE: Switching items
ygData.msgSnippet: You still have to mouse - drag & drop. Even though we call them hot keys they are really just place to mouse - side by side and visible while in the normal
ygData.messageBody:
You still have to mouse - drag & drop. Even though we call them "hot keys"
they are really just place to mouse - side by side and visible while in the
'normal' view mode (ie: you don't have to open the inventory screen.)

So my hot key pallet is like this:

1 inv - 1 melee

2 inv - 2 melee

3 inv - 7 inv

With stuffs set for battle:

1 inv (empty) - 1 melee Ashenwood Spear

2 inv Mandolin - 2 melee Dragoon Dirk

3 inv Drum - 7 inv Flute

So now to switch to heal mode: click Ashenwood, click Mandolin, click Dirk,
click empty spot and you will see:

1 inv Dirk - 1 melee (empty)

2 inv Ashenwood - 2 melee Mandolin

3 inv Drum - 7 inv Flute

Hope that helps!

Sylly Songsynger
Bard of the 22st song
Selling Swords and Such
somewhere on Innoruuk




-----Original Message-----
From: Ben Wilson [mailto:bwilson@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 24, 1999 12:32 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Switching items

From: Ben Wilson <bwilson@...>

Hi,
I have tried to figure out how to do this, and I'm at a
terrible loss. I
made hot keys for my melee slots, 1 and 2, and I made a hot
key for an
inventory slot. When I try any of these hot keys, nothing
happens. It would
make my life SO much easier if I could figure out how to do
this. If someone
wouldn't mind stepping through the process exactly how it
should be done, I
would be eternally grateful. This is my first bard, and I'm
having a blast,
made lv10 this weekend!

Thanks,
Leaflay

> -----Original Message-----
> From: claudio gante [SMTP:gante@...]
> Sent: Monday, August 23, 1999 10:49 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Switching items
>
> From: "claudio gante" <gante@...>
>
> You can assign inventory slots to HotKeys,
> Just like any other assign, press a slot with your
left mouse
> button
> for 2 seconds then drop it in the hot key, do the same
with your primary
> and secondary weapon slots and u will have a fast way to
swap them.
> []'s Kel
